name: Cowidgets – Elementor Addons
author: Codeless

sections.description:
High-Quality Elementor Widgets, Header & Footer Builder for Elementor, Modern Sliders & Project Galleries – all for FREE

Powerful Elementor widgets to create outstanding websites. CoWidgets plugins come with Elementor widgets, blocks for headers, content, and footer. Grab more than 100+ unique Styles & Blocks for building modern websites.

-Header Widgets, Header Builder, Megamenu
-Powerful & Beautiful Elementor Sliders
-Footer Widgets, Footer Builder
-HQ Elementor Widgets
-Portfolio Styles & Grid,Carousel Widgets
-Testimonial Styles & Layouts
-Posts Styles & Grid,Carousel Widgets

CoWidgets website for full details

Speed up website development

Building a website using Cowidgets by Codeless it’s easier but what’s makes this plugin awesome is the capability of building Modern & Unique websites (with Impactful Design) and standing out from the crowd. Usually, these designs cost a fortune – Get Cowidgets, build faster, save money!

Pre-built templates & blocks

A continuous growing library of pre-built blocks and templates to build any section of your website with just a few clicks. One-click importer of blocks takes your design abilities to a whole new level! Once Imported, you can customize even small details of your website without touching a line of code!

Fast Loading widgets, keep your website light

Cowidgets makes sure to load only needed resources. If Page loading is something that interests you because of its importance, you’re in the right place. We are building high performing websites and WordPress products for years. Cowidgets has a modular architecture that gives you full control over switching ON/OFF various widgets. Also, it comes with in-built performance tools. All built with Vanilla Native JS.

Other Features

Modern Elementor widgets for unlimited design possibilities

  • Header Widgets & Megamenu
  • Beautiful Sliders & Project Galleries
  • 20+ Premium Portfolio Styles library
  • Regular Updates
  • Developers Friendly
  • Video Tutorials
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins -> Add New and search for Cowidgets – Elementor Addons
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress. Make sure that you have installed the Elementor plugin.
  3. Go to Appearance -> Codeless Header/Footer/Blocks to build a header or footer layout using Elementor.
  4. After the layout is ready assign it as header or footer using the option ‘Select the type of template this is’
sections.faq:
How Does This Plugin Work?

  1. Go to Appearance -> Codeless Header/Footer/Blocks to build a header or footer layout using Elementor.
  2. Click on “Add New” and design a template with Elementor.
  3. Once the template is ready, set is like a header/footer/block using options “Type of Template”

Can You Create a Mobile Responsive Header/Footer Using This Plugin?

Yes, You can create the mobile responsive layout of your header using the plugin just like you do it using Elementor on other pages. Check this Elementor tutorial: https://elementor.com/introducing-mobile-editing/

This same applies when you are creating your Header/Footer using this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Fixed: Security bugs

1.1.2

  • Added: Compatibility of podcast elements with all platforms

1.0.9

  • Fixed: Portfolio Grid from Gallery Images not working

1.0.8

  • Fixed: Fatal Error

1.0.7

  • Added: New Podcast Elements

1.0.6

  • Fixed: Nav Menu var-dump issue

1.0.5

  • Fixed: Nav Menu Menu trigger buttons, svg upload fixed

1.0.4

  • Fixed: Link on Ishmi style fixed
  • Added: Orderby options on Sliders query selector.
  • Added: Video support on Kiri and Hudson slider
  • Added: New Slider (specifically for videos) Vjosa

1.0.3

  • Fixed: Error not loading css-icons on elementor back-end.

1.0.2

  • Fixed Warning notice from elementor on some widgets
  • Fixed author display name
  • Fixed: Show all portfolio items when Media gallery is selected as source.
  • Added: Option for “Preview” text – remake portfolio style
  • Added: Style specific options on Portfolio Carousel
  • Fixed: Portfolio Isotope Filters
  • Fixed: Kiri not loading images
  • Fixed: Hudson Scroll text removed
  • Fixed: Small css issues

1.0.1

  • Added Specular Compat

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
